name: Daedalus Labyrinth
description:
Daedalus Labyrinth is a top down shooter game combining characters and elements from Greek mythology.
Help write history while playing as Theseus,attempting to defeat the evil Minotaur dwelling inside the maze.

This is a student game created as part of a game design course in our degree.
You can mute the game in the options, and return to the main menu at any point by pressing escape.
